meanings: (가난·구속 등에서) free (sb from sth), break away (from), rid oneself of
(요점·주제 등을) be off the point, be beside the point
quit a hired job and start one´s own business

vlive.korean: 전 이 세상의 굴레를 벗어나... I'm now leaving all of these... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) OFFLINE #10
vlive.english: I'm now leaving all of these...

vlive.korean: [과연 바비 브라운 팀은 굴레를 벗어나 성공할 수 있을지...?] [Will the team move on and succeed?] View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY "TIME TO TWICE" - Noraebang Battle EP.02
vlive.english: [Will the team move on and succeed?]

vlive.korean: 제가 검은색 흰색에서 못 벗어나요 여러분. We must not be able to dress in anything besides black and white. 듣기 View video BRANDNEWBOYS : 커피될게 우유해줘
vlive.english: We must not be able to dress in anything besides black and white.

vlive.korean: 언니 가봤자, 여기 못 벗어나요. You can't get out of here. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 소원여신이 내려오신 날
vlive.english: You can't get out of here.

vlive.korean: 그것을 어떻게 하던지 한번 벗어나 보자. I wanted to get away from the norm. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 현빈X유해진X김주혁X임윤아 <공조> 무비토크 라이브 'Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: I wanted to get away from the norm.

examples.korean: The car spun right off the track. 발음듣기 그 차는 팽 돌면서 길을 완전히 벗어나 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car spun right off the track. 발음

examples.korean: He strayed into the path of an oncoming car. 발음듣기 그가 길을 벗어나 마주 달려오는 자동차의 진로로 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He strayed into the path of an oncoming car. 발음

examples.korean: His demands were out of bounds. 발음듣기 그의 요구는 한도를 벗어나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His demands were out of bounds. 발음

examples.korean: The aircraft overshot the runway. 발음듣기 그 비행기가 활주로를 벗어나 더 달려 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The aircraft overshot the runway. 발음

examples.korean: His remarks were clearly beyond the pale. 발음듣기 그의 발언은 분명히 도리를 벗어나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His remarks were clearly beyond the pale. 발음
